message: Let's start with a reasonable split. I believe this offer benefits us both.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor.  How about we meet in the middle a bit more?
I understand you want a more even split, but keep in mind the money loses value quickly for me. This is the same offer as last time.
This is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a perfectly fair 50/50 split. Take it or leave it, but the pot is shrinking for both of us!
